english_translation: I was sitting with Ali when a man from Hamdah came to him and said: O Commander of the Believers, I bought a pregnant cow to sacrifice with it, and she gave birth. What is your opinion concerning her and her offspring? He said: Do not milk her except for what is surplus to her offspring. When the day of sacrifice comes, sacrifice her and her offspring on behalf of seven people from your household.
